answer: The possibility of a low value of sin2β motivates the construction of a reference unitarity triangle, which is constructed using the unitarity of the CKM matrix and the experimental values of the well known CKM elements (hep-ph/0102274).
explanation: This paper directly addresses the construction of a reference unitarity triangle motivated by the possibility of a low value of sin2β, using the CKM matrix and experimental values of its elements.
